parameters.description: Consumers are required to provide a Cookie header when the user participates in a works-for relationship and wants to search under the context of the works-for user. clientNmUniqueId in the cookie must match path parameter. Cookie example: X_NM_CLIENT_CONTEXT={"worksForLoginId": "abc1234","worksForNmUniqueId": "AAABBBCCC", "clientNmUniqueId":"AAABBBCCC"}
